name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Canned Responses: Templates for Gmail and WA

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write emails and messages faster - Increase your productivity with templates and quick replies on Gmail, Whatsapp, or Instagram

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Write emails and quick replies faster with templates.

Create templates for writing or replying repetitive messages. Responding to your emails, whatsapp and instagram messages is super easy with this quick replies templates tool. All you need to do is:
👉 Create a new Template with your content
👉 And insert in any of your messages with shortcut key within milliseconds.

Isn't it super fast?

Not Limited to that. The Canned responses is specially designed for following use cases:
👉 using templates to write emails.
👉 quick replies to emails.
👉 quick replies to whatsapp messages [WA messages].
👉 quick replies to instagram messages.
👉 quick replies to Linkedin.
👉 quick replies on twitter.

The email templates for Gmail tool supports writing quick replies on other social media platforms like WhatsApp, instagram, X[Twitter], Linkedin and many other websites. All you need is to create a quick reply templates.

Who can use this email templates for Gmail tool?
👉 Customer Support
👉 Sales
👉 Newsletter
👉 Digital Marketer
👉 Small or big business
👉 Online sellers
👉 Freelancers
👉 SaaS product owners
👉 Shopify store owners

does this email templates for Gmail tool work on other websites or communication platforms?
Yes, the tool works on whatsapp, instagram, X, Linkedin and other websites.

➡️ Here are the steps to use Gmail™ Email Templates:
👉 Create the templates with keyboard shortcut [key_name]
👉 Use it like [ /key_name␣ ] that is [/][key_name][space_key]
